蓫蓫蓫

蓫字的基本解释

蓫
zhú
〔蓫薚〕即“商陆”，多年生草本植物，根入药。
羊蹄菜，一种草本植物，根可入药：“言采其蓫。”

蓫字的汉语字典释义

[①]［chù］
［《廣韻》丑六切，入屋，徹。］
［《廣韻》許竹切，入屋，曉。］
植物名。又叫羊蹄菜。似萝卜，茎赤，多吃令人下痢。

蓫字的康熙字典解释

【申集上】【艸字部】　蓫； 康熙笔画：17； 页码：页1052第13
【唐韻】直六切，音逐。【詩·小雅】我行其野，言采其蓫。【傳】蓫，惡菜也。【箋】牛蘈也。陸註：今人謂之羊蹄。【爾雅·釋草】蓫?，馬尾。　又【唐韻古音】直救反，義同。　又【廣韻】同荲。

蓫字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
蓫字的起名意思

暂无。

weed
Basic explanation of words
weed
zhú
〔蓫薚〕 means "Pokeweed", a perennial herb whose roots are used as medicine.
Berry, a kind of herb, the root can be used as medicine: "Say to pick its follicles."
weed
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［chù］
["Guangyun" ugly six cuts, enter the house, thoroughly. ]
["Guangyun" Xu Zhuqie, enter the house, Xiao. ]
Botanical name. It's also called sheep's hoof. Like a radish, the stems are red, and eating more can make you diarrhea.
weed
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shen Ji 1] [Department of Characters] 　蓫; Kangxi Strokes: 17; Page Number: Page 1052 13
[Tang Yun] Straight six cuts, sound by tone. 【Poetry·Xiaoya】I do what I do, and what I say is what I say. [Biography] Shishi, evil dishes are also. [Note] Niu Lai also. Lu's Note: Today's people call it a sheep's hoof. [Erya Shicao] Xiao?, Ponytail.　[Tang Yun Gu Yin] Straightforward to save the opposition, the same meaning.　[Guangyun] Same as Xun.
